color_picking_instruction_1: Click anywhere on the screen to pick a color
onboarding_instruction_1: Click the top-left button to start color picking
onboarding_instruction_1_mac: Click the top-right button to start color picking
prompt_text: Please describe the following color. Input format: - HSL: [hsl value] - RGB: [rgb value] - Hex: [hex value] Requirements: 1. Description only includes: - Basic hue name - Approximate or blended tones [[prompt_text_color_impression_requirement]] [[prompt_text_color_scenario_requirement]] 2. Use English for the description 3. Limit the response to 200 characters 4. Do not include any color codes (HSL/RGB/Hex) 5. Do not include any formatting in your output, and provide the response in a single paragraph. Example: Input: - HSL: hsl(120, 2%, 16%) - RGB: rgb(40, 42, 40) - Hex: #282A28 Output: This is a deep iron gray, close to charcoal tones with an olive undertone. [[prompt_text_color_impression_example]] [[prompt_text_color_scenario_example]]
prompt_text_color_impression_example: It conveys seriousness, professionalism, and mystery.
help_message_text: Please refer to our [[readme_link_text]] for information on setting up the API key for the language model and more.
provider_select_note: API token costs vary by provider and model. For details, please refer to the official documentation of the respective provider.
api_key_note: Enter the API key obtained from the service provider. The key will only be stored locally on your device. Please keep it secure.
model_description: The list is roughly sorted by the number of parameters from low to high. Generally, smaller models respond faster and are more economical, while larger models generate more vivid outputs.
custom_req_type_description: If you’re unsure about the request format, use the default 'OpenAI format'.
custom_endpoint_description: Fill in according to the provider’s documentation, e.g.: https://your-custom-endpoint.com/v1/chat/completions
custom_model_id_description: Enter the model or snapshot ID as provided in the provider’s documentation (not the display name). Inference models are not supported in this version.
language_note: Some settings will take effect after restarting the app.
color_pick_shortcut_description: Shortcut must include at least Ctrl, Shift, or Alt with a number or letter. Press Backspace to clear.
color_pick_shortcut_description_mac: Shortcut must include at least Command, Shift, or Option with a number or letter. Press Backspace to clear.
color_pick_shortcut_alert: The shortcut is already in use by the system. Please choose another.
error_model_invalid: Please select a language model in the settings menu at the bottom right.
error_api_key_invalid: Please enter a valid language model API key in the settings menu at the bottom right.
error_no_response: API did not respond. Check your settings or network connection.
error_unhandled_error: An unknown error occurred. Please check your settings and try again.
error_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
error_invalid_response: The API returned an invalid response.
req_type_custom_openai: OpenAI format (compatible with most mainstream models)
open_source_statement: ColorLift is an open-source app licensed under GPL-3.0-only.
disclaimer_statement: This tool is not intended for precise color measurement or professional guidance. All color descriptions and recommendations are AI-generated. Please verify critical information.
update_available_dialog_message: A new version ({{latestVersion}}) is available. Download via browser?
no_update_dialog_message: You are using the latest version.
update_error_dialog_message: Unable to check for updates. Visit our GitHub repository to download the latest version.
